name: Wordtune
description: Writing assistant that rewrites sentences to adjust tone, clarity, and emphasis. Wordtune is an AI-powered writing companion focused on phrasing and tone. Unlike a grammar checker, it rewrites sentences to be more casual, formal, concise, or expanded, acting as a "co-writer" rather than a proofreader. Excellent for overcoming writer's block or refining non-native English.
